column3: TRAFFIC ALERT FOR S BROADWAY / WATER MAIN BREAK:
column4: Outbound/southbound S Broadway is shutdown between W Main St and W Vine St until further notice.

column3: TRAFFIC ALERT FOR S BROADWAY / WATER MAIN BREAK:
column4: Motorists may use Main St onto Vine St, then back onto S Broadway (go around Triangle Park).
